title: What are the most attended sporting events? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Tour de France cycle race - the number of spectators at recent events is estimated to be 12 to 15 million. Many other cycle races and similar events will have huge number of spectators. This number is the aggregate number of spectators over the whole three week event, but still phenomenal numbers. Between 1900-1940 the crowd for Derby Day at Epsom Downs regularly exceeded 300,000. Estimates of 500,000 in 1913 and 1934! Indianapolis 500 estimated 400,000.

Soccer matches have turned out the biggest crowds historically, however events that cover multiple days (olympics, tournaments etc. Etc. Etc.) Gather the largest crowds. See the link for detailed statistical information. https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_sports_attendance_figures
